QuestData.Title: Krakauer
QuestData.Description: Krakauer is up on the chopping block as we speak! The orcs brought in a Gurubashi witch doctor to perform a dark ritual on him. We need to kill that troll to free Krakauer!$B$BLet's go! He's just inside the cave here. Hang a right at the first fork.
QuestData.RewardText: Wha... Where am I? What happened? Messner? Jorgensen?$B$BOH MY GOSH! We have to get to Danforth! It might already be too late!
